projects.title: Alyani's-Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Showcased projects, achievements, education, about me, and skills in the portfolio to effectively communicate my strengths and accomplishments.
- Enhanced the portfolio website with **modern features**, including **support for dark mode**, to stay up-to-date with industry trends.
- Utilized **React.js, React-Hooks**, React-Routing, and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.

projects.title: Multi-Crypto-Details
projects.bodyText:
- Integrated **Coingecko.com APIs** to list over **100** cryptocurrencies and provide in-depth details, including **charts and stats**.
- Implemented some days-wise data to show the progress of coins in **chart form**.
- Overcoming challenges such as **API integration and responsive design** to create a user-friendly website.

projects.title: RealTime-Quiz-React-WebApp
projects.bodyText:
- Created **category-wise quizzes**, including topics such as sports, music, history, and politics, and **difficulty-wise quizzes** such as **Easy/Medium/Hard**.
- Integrated **OpenDB API** to source **10 multiple-choice questions** for each quiz category.
- Demonstrated knowledge of deployment and hosting technologies by deploying the application using **Netlify**.

projects.title: Beast-Gym
projects.bodyText:
- Developed and designed the website for Beast Gym Website using front-end technologies such as **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**.
- Designed and developed a **responsive** website to advertise BEAST GYM, featuring key sections such as **user login/registration, gym features, expert trainers, pricing** Etc.
- Optimized the websiteâ€™s performance and user experience by implementing **responsive design, minimizing page load times, and improving navigation.**

projects.title: Weather-WebApp
projects.bodyText:
- **Live Weather Updates**: Provided users with up-to-date weather data, including **temperature, humidity, wind speed, and forecast** for their **desired locations**.
- **Interactive UI**: Designed an intuitive and visually appealing user interface with interactive elements, allowing users to easily navigate and access weather information.
- **Location Search**: Implemented a search feature that enables users to find weather information for any **city or region worldwide**, providing localized weather details.

projects.title: Restaurant
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an engaging and visually appealing restaurant website to enhance the online presence and customer experience for a local establishment. Key features include:
- **Responsive Design**: Created a **mobile-friendly** website that adapts seamlessly across different devices, providing a consistent and intuitive user experience.
- **Menu Showcase**: Designed an interactive menu section to showcase the restaurant's offerings, including All Available dishes, beverages, and special promotions.

projects.title: Spend-Tracker(Team Project)
projects.bodyText:
- A Spend-Tracker Web-App made in React-Native.
- It provides us funtionality to track our daily expences.
- It has Login/Register for user.
- You can not down your day to day trasactions date-wise
- We are still working on it for some better features Like : Monthly Charts, Wallet like paytm,Improving Ui etc...
